_header: The mild Lamb I-spread on Rood
Subjects: devotional verse; Passion, meditations on; songs
_description: Christ on the Cross — six 8-line stanzas (aaabcccb)

BLAru248.First Lines:
Þe milde Lamb isprad o rodeheng behornen al o
                    blode…
BLAru248.Last Lines:
…And brinc hus þurw þi suete beneto þe blis
                    þat faillet nout
